generated_body: In the article titled "Boomers Want to Stay Home. Senior Housing Now Faces a Budding Glut," the user can expect an exploration of the current trends in senior housing, particularly as baby boomers express a preference for aging in place rather than moving to assisted living facilities. The piece may discuss the implications of this shift, including potential surpluses in senior housing developments and how real estate markets are adapting to meet the needs of an aging population. It is likely to provide insights into demographic changes and the evolving landscape of senior care options.
